title: (x) Eurostar advertising campaign - Aspect {Paul D Hunt}
content:
I can't put my finger on it, but I recognise the R ...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415081319im_/http:/typophile.com/files/maincopy_6144.gif)
author: Jordan Harper

comments.content: That R looks like Priori but that's not your font.
Yes, Aspect without all the quirky goodness of the lowercase or swash alternates. Still looks nice though.
You can see it used intensively on their [website](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415081319/http:/londonxperience.eurostar2london.be/homepage/_nl/index.aspx).
